item.title: Build a data feature that matters.
item.description: The most important skill of any aspiring data professional is the ability to make kick butt, automated data features (and ultimately, products). This fact has given rise to what I‚Äôll dub here as the ‚Äúfull stack‚Äù data scientist.

item.title: Hi, I'm Austin.
item.description: Nice to finally meet you, it's been too long. First, thank you for taking the time to read some of the things I’ve written. Second, here are a few things about me.
